places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Sai Panchvati
address: Jagadmba Towers, Lane, Cinema Rd, opp. Gandhi Printing Press, Kumarpet, Mahalaxmiwada, Adilabad, Telangana 504001, India

reviews.text: Nice place. May be because of how not busy it is room service is slow as is the dine-in restuarant service. Rooms were ok - linen was clean but walls had seepage damage
Comfortable hotel with spacious rooms. Staff is friendly and there is late night room service available.
Nice place. May be because of how not busy it is room service is slow as is the dine-in restuarant service.

We stayed here for one night on our road trip and Considering a small city- Adilabad... It's a good hotel with all amenities. We had a good comfortable stay. Complementary breakfast was also good!  Room was pretty big enough and clean! Washroom also was clean. That's all we want from a hotel! ⭐⭐⭐⭐

We habe booked this ona way to banglore from delhi, room was ok with lots of mosquitoes bed was ok but blanket was stained. We had paid 3500 for 3 people which is little costly for this place and underground parking was submerge inwater atleat 3-5 cm so not very good experince for me.

places_with_reviews.name: KAKAKU The Guest House
address: 7-1-33/5, 1st Floor, NTR Square, Dwaraka Nagar, Ravindra Nagar Colony, Adilabad, Telangana 504001, India

reviews.text:
This is an old facility and I found the food to be a little overpriced. However our stay was amazing. Never seen such great hospitality. This place should not be confused with a hotel, it’s a guest house and gives you a very homely “heritage homestay vibe” .
So if you are planning to stay here, better make arrangements for food at the reception beforehand. Best suited for people traveling from Bangalore and Hyderabad onwards to Varanasi or Jabalpur or vice versa. And yes, if the owner is in town, don’t miss the delicious chicken curry prepared by him. Net net, I will choose this place for its hospitality, pleasant and supportive staff and a charming owner with great culinary skills.

Didn't expect such a beautiful guest house in the small town of Adilabad! Rooms are great, neat and tidy, decorated. The location is bit odd having narrow lanes with no parking, and a alcohol shop located nearby. There is one person in the reception, who received cordially, but there is no watchman. There are 5 rooms, each with different capacity. There is also a hall, and Verandah, separate self serving kitchen with dining hall.

We had a great stay here. Very cooperative staff especially Shiva and Amjad. Well decorated and highly maintained guesthouse. The staff are very friendly, the food is good. Very beautiful furniture and decor too. Felt like Goa honestly ✨
Rooms are very clean and neat . Ambience are very nice . Receptionist is communicating really soft . Price is high but totally value for money 👌.

The road in front is very narrow and has a cheap Liquor store (crowded) adjacent to the stay and it is highly unsafe and specially not recommended for families.

Pathetic experience. We thought of booking a decent stay with family without bothering for the expense (cost). Rooms are small with too much plastic stuff (unnecessary) and very less useful space inside and outside the rooms. It is a very congested place and feels claustrophobic.

Parking is not available.

For the cost there's hardly any amenities, Not a working TV (without recharge if available), a decent closet, water kettle.

The bedsheets were not soft and clean, blanket were smelly.

Food is expensive and below average in taste.

There was Hiccups in the room allotment process. The caretaker (obviously with owners involvement) tried to cheat us for a double Deluxe room instead of booking triple deluxe room (with prior full payment). After a long confrontation they gave us the room booked. The worst is that they did not had the courtesy to accept their mistake. They took 2 bookings for the same room that day and the other family had to suffer.

The staff is not courteous and professional.
Overall an underwhelming experience and highly unrecommended.

Please do not waste your hard earned money, there are decent places in Adilabad at cheaper cost.

places_with_reviews.name: Mangalamurthy Hotels
address: Andhra Bank Building, Cinema Rd, Mahalaxmiwada, Adilabad, Telangana 504001, India

reviews.text:
Stayed here in Jan 2024 with family.
1. Food quality is good.
2. Coffee was good. They accommodated requests.
3. They offered us 2 complimentary breakfasts.

But overall experience was not great since
1. There were ants in the room.
2. The cleanliness is not up to the mark. The old guests had left the old soap and it wasn't cleaned.
3. No drinking water was given at the time of check-in. Then later, they charged us for the bottles we requested. Albeit they removed the charge after pointing it out.
4. Check out time was changed and we were informed at the last minute during breakfast.
5. Keeping the luggage in the reception or lounge is also not allowed. We had to haul the luggage around till the train departure timing.
6. The staff had a loud verbal fight in front of my family. Perceivably about the confusion of our checkout.
7. They did not offer any help in booking cabs or auto rickshaws.

Stayed here in Jan 2024.
1.Food quality is good.
2. Coffee was good.
3. They offered us 2 breakfasts.

But overall experience was not great since
1. There were ants in the room.
2. The cleanliness is not upto the mark. The old guests had left the old soap and it wasn't cleaned.
3. No drinking water was given at time of check in.
4. Late check out is not allowed.
5. Keeping the luggage in the reception is also not allowed.
6. The staff had a loud verbal fight in front of my family.
The best thing for this hotel is the location and parking in center of city. All and all the rooms are neat and clean ... service was also apt in my short stay at this property.

The Services are quite good, and also liked the Food here.
Recommended.

Wow super hotel. It is one of the most cleaned and luxury hotel in Adilabad. It's quality and ambience is to good. The hospitality is also good. The food was to good It is very tasty. Specially I liked the breakfast.  Super hotel.

places_with_reviews.name: Dwaraka Hotel.
address: MGCJ+6J2, Dwaraka Nagar, Ravindra Nagar Colony, Adilabad, Telangana 504001, India

reviews.text: All the hotel staff were well behavedand Room was good but price is a bit high compared to other places
Very good hotel, low cost, best bed, best rooms, best toilet, everything is good.

We chose this Hotel for an overnight stay for family. There are not too many hotels in Adilabad and this one would be among top 5 hotels. I think we checked all hotels and lodges in the town before getting into this one. Some hotels didn't have room and some didn't have parking. Most of the hotels were in delapitated conditions. This one was atleast decent hotel with clean room, clean toilet and linens.
Staffs were cordial and tried to help us with all our requirements. Ok for an overnight stay if you are not looking for luxury.
Rooms at not upto mark ....no geyser in the room.no towel or soap is provided.not value for money

1. Hot water facility is good.
2. Car parking is available.
3. Staff behaviour is good.
4. Rooms are in neat and clean.
5. Wash rooms are good and hygienic.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel New Krishna Lodge
address: bustand, Vidya Nagar, Adilabad, Telangana 504001, India

reviews.text:
Kashmir to Kanyakumari Cycling - We had stayed here in Feb 2024 during our expedition. This was the only city where we had to go to different hotels to find a room with decent parking space for our cycles.

The people in general I noticed are a bit shrude in this town. Room and washroom was decent though you have to walk all the way up since there are no lifts.

The caretaker brought us dinner from outside which was good too. We were able to park our cycles in the gates garage. Okay for a one night short stay.
Stayed in New Krishna Hotel Adilabad. Really enjoyed the stay. I recommend everyone. Nice decent location and good staff response made my stay very enjoyable. Thanks

Highly experience with hotel management team. Good rooms and stay calm. Recommended to add one time food for free too.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Adilabad Lodge
address: Door No 4-56 Beside Punjab National Bank walk able from Bus Stand Old, NH 44, Vidya Nagar, Adilabad, Telangana 504001, India

reviews.text:
Zabardast lodge
They arange kuntala waterfall tour
Tippeswar wild life
and kawal reserve forest

They have helped us and arranged car to visit places
Decent hotel to stay near the bus Stop, can improve a bit on their rooms.

Very good hotel

Friendly people

Can visit

Usually i don't write a negative review as i know how hard it is to run any ihotel. But..this is exceptional.
Writing this review at 7:52 morning, we are bikers n checked in at 3 o clock morning itself as we got tired. As the AC room was costly we opted for non AC which is 1000 rupees but now at 7:30 i am sweating profusely as fan not working, they r saying they can't on generator. We r traveling from past 32 days m it's my Worst experience in hotel stay. Rooms are not so clean n bedsheets were stains they changed our bedsheets after i told them, bathroom is smelly u can't sit for more than 5 mins in toilet.

It’s good
And safe 😊

places_with_reviews.name: Dhana Lakshmi Hotel
address: MGGM+J4X, Punjab chowk, Mahalaxmiwada, Adilabad, Telangana 504001, India

reviews.text: Hotel was good for a day or two stay. Its accessibility was the main reason for me to choose this hotel, the room were spic and span. Try to reach this hotel before 11 PM, else there is the owner who acts like a grandmother and closes the door to the lodge post that. Staying at this hotel reminded me of Indian coffee house popularly known as ICH. Try to get food before the lodge closes. Hotel rooms comes with balcony also which is a huge plus at this price point.
It's near to railway station..and old hotel but avarage rooms .ok..

Only one person which was at reception counter incharge was poor in nature not friendly

In this hotel there is no online payment taken only cash was taken and no printed bill was given by him
Nice Hotel.. Clean and Hygienic.. Best choice for stay…

One of the old hotels in Adilabad. Though it is located on the main raod it is difficult to find. Fortunately the room in which we were staying was having a working AC. Average hotel, obviously with no Amenities. Overall good hotel to stay for one day or so.
